name: Metal Arbiter
description:
.................................................................

game in active development

............................................................

Metal Arbiter is an action platformer inspired by Retro games such as Megaman and ShockMan. Play as a mechanical hero fighting an unknown robotic invasion. shoot, jump and dash your way through the fast paced levels. 

keyboard controls

arrow keys - move

a - action/jump

s- cancel/ shoot

w -dash

q- change weapon

Would love to hear any feedback. This game is still being developed and i try to work on it a little bit everyday around my day job.  If you cant afford it but want to play it get just ask, or if you want to source code. i plan on publishing the source code but i don't want to do it until i can clean it up and comment everything to make it a little more friendly to read.
